title: Tutoring
shortDescription: Individualized academic support adapted for neurodivergent learning styles.
description: Specialized tutoring for students with autism provides individualized academic instruction tailored to neurodivergent learning styles. Tutors experienced with autism understand sensory needs, communication differences, and learning preferences that may differ from neurotypical students. Sessions can address reading, math, writing, study skills, and test preparation while incorporating accommodations and strategies that help autistic learners succeed academically.
benefits: Prepares for tests and standardized exams
whoCanBenefit: Kids who learn differently than classroom pace
